body.body: The Max Rebo Band, led by lead singer Snootles, has recently been topping the galactic charts with their new song Galactic Dance Blast. Although the band has existed for a long time in many iterations, they have become particularly popular since playing at Jabba's Palace.

As Far Far Away News explores more parts of the galaxy, we continue to learn more about survival skills from other civilizations. On Hoth, they have adapted to extreme cold weather by using a recently dead carcass of an animal. If you want to experience the same thing, luckily you don't need an animal carcass, as a sleeping bag has been created to mirror this experience.

node.title: Tips for Farming in a Desert

body.body: There's no harder terrain for a desert than a farm.  But if we take some tips from the Lars family, they can show how to successfully run a farm in a desert on a budget.  Their suggestions include adopting children to use as labor and buying from discount marketplaces such as the Jawas.
